Name: The Underground Watcher/地下监察员
About the game: Story Xu Sisi is a young (?) lady who’s looking for a job. In an occasional chance, she finds a short-term recruit advertisement from the government. Everything goes smoothly, she gets this offer. However, with a sudden visitor comes over her workplace, her job becomes not similar to any other colleagues. Xu’s childhood memory that she don’t want to mention is also gradually revealed. Features ·This is an almost no-place-to-jump 2D platformer. ·Simple move list for skills. ·Monster. ·Basement upgrade system. ·Making money by Killing monsters! Pushing the story process by patrolling around the underground world.
